Summary: South San Jose June 5, 2010 at 11:02 P.M.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were in our backyard in south san jose (Branham and Meridian area) around our fire pit when I noticed a red light flying westerly of our home at about 45 deg. traveling from west to east then changing directions southerly. it was silent red-ish like mars with no blinking navigational lights. i pointed it out to my family...we then noticed it was dropping small balls of light from it's underside that fell and vanished...it began to pulse in intensity higher and lower while heading south..then it dimmed a few times before just going out....
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around June 5th 2010
